CODE_DESCRIPTION: This p5.js sketch generates layered Bezier curves using Perlin noise for dynamic control point variation. Each execution draws colorful abstract shapes on a black canvas, with optional overlaid source-code text. The layout respects margin boundaries for composition and varies stroke color, weight, and number of steps randomly. The result is a generative artwork based on controlled noise and randomness.
GENERATION_METHOD: Randomness and Perlin noise for Bezier control points, combined with rule-based structure and color variation
OUTPUT_DESCRIPTION: A static generative artwork consisting of abstract Bezier curves in varying colors and thicknesses on a black canvas, optionally annotated with random text snippets.
